text:
In Tomcat 7.0.68 with this commit:  

http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tomcat/tc7.0.x/tags/TOMCAT_7_0_68/java/org/apache/catalina/session/ManagerBase.java?r1=1726923&r2=1726924

The ManagerBase is incorrectly pulling Context.getSessionTimeout().  It should be multiplying the session timeout by 60, since the Context's session timeout is in minutes and the ManagerBase is in seconds.  

The same change in Tomcat 8.0.x correctly multiplies by 60: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tomcat/tc8.0.x/tags/TOMCAT_8_0_32/java/org/apache/catalina/session/ManagerBase.java?r1=1726196&r2=1726198

- Scott
creator: scott@sdwr.net

text:
Hi,

This has been fixed with r1732675

The fix will be available in 7.0.69 onwards.

Regards,
Violeta
creator: violetagg@apache.org
